Virtual keyboard - a on-screen keyboard¶

class pymt.ui.widgets.vkeyboard.MTKeyButton(keyboard, **kwargs)¶

Internal Class used in MTVKeyboard

on_press(touchID, x, y)¶
on_release(touchID, x, y)¶
class pymt.ui.widgets.vkeyboard.MTTextInput(**kwargs)¶

A text input widget is a simple label widget that will pop up a virtual keyboard when touched any input of the virtual keyboard will then have effect on the TextInput widget
